features.featureTitle: Update the global accent color theme from the current orangish/gold accent to a cleaner, brighter yellow accent across the entire UI while keeping the premium black/white base styling. This must apply consistently to existing accent usage (e.g., `text-gold`, `bg-gold`, `border-gold`, focus rings, hover states, glows, badges/banners, CTAs) on all pages and shared components.

Add the user-provided Baidees Salon logo as a static asset and use it wherever possible across the site: at minimum in the Navbar brand area and Footer brand area, and also set it as the site favicon (and an OG/social preview image if present/used). Ensure sizing works on mobile and desktop and preserves the luxury styling (clean spacing, no pixelation).
